title: Random Game Freezes
body: I'm having a frustrating problem, my computer (as a whole) freezes in the middle of random matches, and it's a complete computer freeze where i have to manually turn my PC off using it's power button. I don't know what is causing it, and it's causing me to get no rewards and low priority queue matchmaking and harming my team because I'm not there.

replies.body: Hey are you running on Windows 10?  This freezing has been known to happen to players with [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) auto-enabled.  Disabling that may help, but test it in a custom and let me know.
Try and reseat your RAM.  Worked for me.
